room intro: Welcome to the Spooky Mansion.You came in as a Traveller but now you are a HERO trapped in this giant mansion. Let me tell you this is a haunted mansion !  If you want to escape this mansion, yo have to pass through the 22 horrific rooms  and your main motive as a Hero is to reach the warzone . Find your way out !
room nav: press 1 to go to the drawing room, press 2 to go to the parking lot, press 3 to enter battle field

room intro: You are in the Goofy Drawing room of the mansion. There are old paintings of the royal family who was murdered by the cruel king 200 years ago.
room nav: press 1 to go back to entrance , press 2 to go to party room, press 3 to go to the dining hall

room intro: This is the backyard of this spooky mansion. The large trees and wild grass holds quite a lot of mystery . The smells of barbeque party are still sensed every evening. Enjoy a fun party with your spooky friends
room nav: press 1 to go back to entrance, press 2 to go to parking lot, press 3 to go to the kitchen

room intro: This is the electronic room where you will see all kinds of gadgets. There are all kinds of antique collection in this room. Don�t pick up the phone if it rings !
room nav: press 1 to go to Study room, press 2 to go to the Washroom, press 3 to go to the closet

room intro: Hey you made it to the party spot of the spirits . Have a great time dancing with your fellow spooky mates.
room nav: press 1 to go to the study room ,press 2 to go to the back yard , press 3 to go for shopping

room intro: This is the study room of the mansion. The king made his children do all their homeworks sitting on these desks. You don�t seem so studious though !
room nav: press 1 to go to the drawing area, press 2 to goto the carwash, press 3 to break into the Libary

room intro: You are in the Bed room of this horrific Mansion ! You see a Queen sized Bed drained with blood. Don't be scared ! Look at other things and choose a door to get out of there
room nav: press 1 to go to back yard, press 2 to go to parking lot, press 3 to go to the entrance

room intro: This is the latest built zone of this spooky mansion. Travellers always come here to get their cars washed but little do they know that the cars get a blood bath.
room nav: press 1 to go to the parking lot, press 2 to go towards entrance, press 3 to go to the sports arena

room intro: Hola ! You are in the royal dining hall of this spooky mansion. There is a big table set up for the feast. Have a good time feasting on snakes ?
room nav: press 1 to go to the garage , press 2 to go shopping, press 3 to party

room intro: This is the Sports room where the king's only son used to practice archery and chess. If you want you can also have a look at the huge badminton, swimming area and golf courts.
room nav: press 1 to go to the study area, press 2 to go to the washroom, press 3 to go to the entrance

room intro: This is the mini mall of this mansion. You can do as much shopping you want. But beware of the mannequins .
room nav: press 1 to go to the kitchen, press 2 to go to the closet ,press 3 to go to the bathing complex

room intro: You are at the parking lot of the Mansion. The royal cars of the king were all parked here. Knock on the doors of the car if you need a ride !
room nav: Press 1 to go party. Press 2 to go to the basement, Press 3 to go to the Bed room

room intro: You are in the master bathroom of this mansion. This room smells a bit different. There is a huge bath tub behind you, open showers and slippery floors. Be careful Please !
room nav: Press 1 to go to the doll house, Press 2 to go to the gadget lounge, Press 3 to go to the car wash

room intro: You found yourself in a closet. Wow ! There are all kinds of royal outfits to explore. Have a look at the antique fashion collection !
room nav: Press 1 to go to the dinning hall, Press 2 to go to the entrance, Press 3 to go to the bathing area

room intro: This is the Kitchen of this Mansion. You look excited to hear that ! You see - It's big, well lit and flavourful kitchen. All the special dishes for the royalty were made in this beautiful kitchen.
room nav: Press 1 to go to the bedroom, press 2 to go to the bathing complex,  press 3 to go to the gadget room

room intro: You are in the repair zone of the Mansion. The garage has all antique tools that you need to fight the spirits !
room nav: Press 1 to go to the pantry, press 2 to go to the drawing room, press 3 to go back to Parking Lot

room intro: Welcome to the favourite place of the queen ! The doll house has all kinds of toys that you can ever imagine. The amazing creations like Anabelle and chucky are waiting for you !
room nav: press 1 to go to the bed room, press 2 to go to the library, press 3 to go back to the entrance

room intro: You were not able to cope with the horror, so you have landed into the washroom to hide ! Freshen up ! There's more horror waiting for you !
room nav: press 1 to go to car wash , press 2 to go to the gadget room, press 3 to go to Garage

room intro: You found the hub of everyone's hunger. The royal chef's call it pantry. You can get all kinds of grocery items stocked up here . The spirits love to eat !
room nav: press 1 to go to the drawing room, press 2 to go to the bathing complex, press 3 to party

room intro: You have entered the biggest library of the ghost town. You have access to all the books . Enjoy reading !
room nav: press 1 to go to the washroom, press 2 to go the shopping mall, press 3 to watch the gadgets

room intro: Finally you are inside our huge battle room . You fought with all the zombies, met barbies and took a tour of all our haunted rooms. As a token , your fate is victory. Congratulations ! You win the Game . See You Again.
You are in the horrific basement room. The basement hold the darkest spirit  who wants to kill you. Oh ! No ! You shouldn't have been here. You get killed & you lose !
